introduction.purpose: We're conducting a survey with employees at these establishments who are responsible for ordering merchandise.
introduction.question: Does any of those three phrases describe you?

responses.no: May I speak to the owner, manager, or person responsible for ordering merchandise?

survey.introduction: Hello, this is calling from. I'd like to ask you a few questions - this will only take a few minutes of your time, ok?

questions.text: What type of establishment have I called? Do not read list - probe to clarify if necessary.
questions.condition: If none of the above, terminate.

questions.text: Is this store/gas station/delicatessen/restaurant part of a chain, or is it independently owned and operated?
